name: Neon Spire
description:
DODGE! DASH! JUMP! DIE!
Ascend as high as you can in the Neon Spire!  Death is permanent in this randomly generated arcade game, in which you need quick thinking and timing to get a better high score.

In a never-ending spire, you are just one of many cubes who've attempted to make it to the top.  Rising from cubes that have failed the task, you set off again in the unending random cycle.

Early Access: Ver 1.0.0 Controls

Jump:        Space | Click

Dash:                  A | D

Credits

Programming / Game Design - Gabriel Hasenoehrl

Art / Design - Aaron Yama

Music - Armond Smart'el
